nl.BobbinWork.diagram.model
Class Bounds<T extends Segment>

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Polygon
      nl.BobbinWork.diagram.model.Bounds<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The Segment denotes for which presentation type the bounding polygon applies.
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.Shape, java.io.Serializable
public class Bounds<T extends Segment>
extends java.awt.Polygon

Polygon containing the Segments of a Partition, fitting together like jigsaw pieces. In contrast with Shape.getBounds2D() the polygons of different Partitions don't overlap but touch one another.

Author:
jokep
